maximum production yield of 22 mol g -1 then it was diminished, however, the generation of CH3CHO was slightly increased to 11.7 mol g -1 as shown in Fig. 10b.On the other hand, Zn400 showed a production yield of CH3OH and CH3CHO of 50.9 mol g -1 and 11.6 mol g -1 , respectively as shown in Fig. 10c.
